name: VITAL
description:
VITAL is a first person puzzle platformer taking place in a dream world. You have no idea where you are or how you got there. The only thing that is certain is that someone or something doesn't want you to wake up. Explore the mind of a fragile individual and solve physics-based puzzles. Every step forward is one step closer to the truth.

Features:

  • Explore a beautiful and bizarre world
  • Over 20 levels with multiple challenging physics-based puzzles
  • Use gravity, force, expanding and shrinking objects to progress deeper into the world
  • Story driven gameplay, talk with eccentric and weird characters and read notes to find out what's going on
  • Multiple endings
  • Steam achievements
